title: Confessions Over Cocktails
description: Nothing is beyond the raunchy inventiveness of Sarah, Gillian, Monique and Pam as they get together over cocktails to share their spicy confessions of erotic and sometimes unnatural sexual encounters as they indulge in their deepest sexual fantasies. Four explicit, erotic stories to arouse your secret desires and gratify your lust for sometimes unusual sexual activities. Definitely only for the broadminded!
author: Aphrodite Cerigo
